Name: Backpack
Description: Canvas pack that redistributes weight for long treks.

Properties.Effect: Increase carrying capacity by 10 lb before encumbrance.

Name: Bedroll
Description: Simple bedding that keeps adventurers warm outdoors.

Properties.Effect: Grants advantage on Endurance checks to avoid exhaustion while camping.

Name: Rations (1 day)
Description: Preserved trail food for one traveler.

Properties.Effect: Sustains one creature for a day; counts toward Survival checks.

Name: Torch
Description: Oil-soaked torch that lights the dark.

Properties.Effect: Burns for 1 hour, illuminating 20 feet of bright light and 20 feet of dim light.

Name: Lantern
Description: Metal lantern that shields flame from wind.

Properties.Effect: Provides bright light for 6 hours on a flask of oil.

Name: Hemp Rope (50 ft)
Description: Durable rope for climbing or securing loads.

Properties.Effect: Supports up to 300 lb before breaking.

Name: Climber's Kit
Description: Harness, pitons, and gloves designed for scaling cliffs.

Properties.Effect: Grants advantage on Athletics checks made to climb.

Name: Waterskin
Description: Leather skin that keeps water cool during travel.

Properties.Effect: Holds enough water for one creature for a day.

Name: Flint & Steel
Description: Spark kit for lighting torches or campfires.

Properties.Effect: Allows fire starting without a check in dry conditions.

Name: Healing Potion
Description: Ruby liquid that hastens recovery when imbibed.

Name: Thieves' Tools
Description: Delicate picks and probes for locks and traps.

Properties.Effect: Required for lockpicking; grants +2 bonus to related Crafting or Stealth checks.

Name: Herbalism Kit
Description: Mortar, pestle, and poultice supplies for field medics.

Properties.Effect: Allows crafting of basic antidotes or poultices during rests.

Name: Spyglass
Description: Brass telescope ideal for scouting sea or land.

Properties.Effect: Magnifies distant objects; gain +5 to Perception checks at long range.

Name: Grappling Hook
Description: Metal hook that secures rope to ledges or battlements.

Properties.Effect: Thrown up to 20 feet; grants +2 to subsequent climbing attempts.
